description.en: Daily COVID-19 cases at national and state level, broken down by vaccination status.
description.bm: Kes COVID-19 harian di peringkat kebangsaan dan negeri, dengan pecahan mengikut status vaksinasi.

variables.name: cases_unvax
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of new cases for which no vaccination record is found
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes baharu di mana tiada rekod vaksinasi dapat dikesan

variables.name: cases_pvax
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of new cases where the individual received at least 1 dose of any vaccine, but has not yet been fully vaccinated
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes baharu di mana individu telah menerima sekurang-kurangnya satu dos bagi mana-mana vaksin, tetapi belum lagi lengkap divaksinasi

variables.name: cases_fvax
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of new cases where the individual received the second dose of a two-dose vaccine at least 14 days ago, or the first dose of a one-dose vaccine at least 28 days ago; boosted cases are removed from this number
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes baharu di mana individu telah menerima dos kedua daripada vaksin dua dos sekurang-kurangnya 14 hari lepas, ataupun dos pertama bagi vaksin satu dos sekurang-kurangnya 28 hari lepas; kes lengkap dos penggalak tidak dikira dalam angka ini

variables.name: cases_boost
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of new cases where the individual received a booster dose at least 7 days ago
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes baharu di mana individu telah menerima dos penggalak sekurang-kurangnya 7 hari lepas

variables.name: Daily COVID-19 Cases by Vaccination Status & State
variables.title_en: Daily COVID-19 Cases by Vaccination Status & State
variables.title_bm: Kes COVID-19 Harian mengikut Status Vaksinasi & Negeri
variables.desc_en: Daily COVID-19 cases at national and state level, broken down by vaccination status.
variables.desc_bm: Kes COVID-19 harian di peringkat kebangsaan dan negeri, dengan pecahan mengikut status vaksinasi.

en.methodology: Building on the [base dataset](https://data.moh.gov.my/data-catalogue/healthcare_covid_cases), this dataset tabules new COVID-19 cases by vaccination status by deterministically matching individual-level COVID-19 case data with COVID-19 vaccination records from the Malaysian Vaccine Administration System (MyVAS). Matching is done using the individual's IC/BC number (for Malaysians) or passport (for non-Malaysians), with only exact matches permitted.
en.caveat: It is possible that the number of vaccinated cases exceeds the tabulated number, for instance if an individual was vaccinated under an ID different from the ID used in the COVID-19 test result declaration, or if an individual was vaccinated outside the country and has not yet uploaded their records to MyVAS. However, these issues are negligible in magnitude.
en.publication: KKMNOW features a [dashboard on COVID-19](https://data.moh.gov.my/dashboard/covid-19) where you can explore the data in a more interactive manner!

bm.methodology: Berdasarkan [set data asas](https://data.moh.gov.my/data-catalogue/healthcare_covid_cases), set data ini memaparkan kes COVID-19 baharu mengikut status vaksin melalui pemadanan data kes COVID-19 peringkat individu dengan rekod vaksinasi COVID-19 daripada Sistem Pentadbiran Vaksin Malaysia (MyVAS). Pemadanan dilakukan menggunakan nombor kad pengenalan / sijil kelahiran (untuk warganegara Malaysia) ataupun nombor pasport (untuk bukan warganegara), dengan hanya padanan 100% diterima.
bm.caveat: Ada kemungkinan bahawa bilangan kes yang divaksinasi melebihi bilangan yang rekod yang dapat dipadankan, contohnya jika seseorang individu telah divaksin di bawah ID yang berbeza daripada ID yang digunakan dalam pengisytiharan keputusan ujian COVID-19, ataupun jika seseorang individu telah divaksin di luar negara dan belum memuat naik rekod mereka ke MyVAS. Walau bagaimanapun, isu-isu ini tidak signifikan secara keseluruhan.
bm.publication: Portal KKMNOW sendiri memaparkan [papan pemuka tentang COVID-19](https://data.moh.gov.my/dashboard/covid-19) di mana anda boleh menerokai data ini dengan lebih interaktif!
